text: navu malak‌galanne narakada kavalugararagisiruvevu mattu avara sankhyeyannu dhikkarigala palige parikseyagisiruvevu – granthadavaru nambalendu hagu visvasigala visvasavu heccalendu mattu granthadavaragali visvasigalagali sansayakke tuttagabaradendu mattu manas'sinalli rogaviruvavaru hagu dhikkarigalu ‘‘i udaharaneya mulaka allahanu bayasuvudenannu?’’ Endu kelalendu. I riti allahanu tanicchisidavarannu darigedisuttane. Hagu tanicchisidavarige saridariyannu toruttane. Nim'ma odeyana padegala kuritu avana horatu bere yarigu tiliyadu. Idu manavarigagiruva upadesa matravagide
